reviews.review: ce jeu est un nid à merde. Je ne prend même plus de plaisir à jouer vivement que ce jeu meurt définitivement

A good game ruined with one update because devs wanted some more money for their cigarettes, many people have been thrown under the bus after grinding for months, if not years, to get free prime, only to be a couple levels away before the cash grab update, which I like to call, that forces you to pay to play with a privileged userbase or tryhard adults who invest a fortune in their gaming equipment.
